Shall not serve as chairman or a member of the board of directors of MFS or any other investment adviser? 3. Shall not serve as chief executive officer, president or any other officer of MFS or any other investment adviser? 4. (ii) be employed by and act as a portfolio manager of a registered investment company and/or manage other investment personnel with respect to investment and personnel decisions and (iii) participate in the marketing of nonmutual fund business of MFS or of such other investment adviser as may then employ Ballen." for 27 months#
